<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Detective's Readiness](/Feats.aspx?ID=5947) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 108 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

When you're on a case, you stay watchful and resolute to avoid tricks your suspect might pull. You gain your investigation bonus from [Pursue a Lead](/Actions.aspx?ID=2811) on saving throws (and their DCs, as normal) against creatures or effects that are related to the question at the heart of an open investigation, and you can use [Clue In](/Actions.aspx?ID=2812) to assist an ally's saving throw against that creature or effect.
name: Detective's Readiness
